bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with yu 鬱①, pent-up [qi]. Yi xue ru men 醫學入門 6: 痰火胸膈鬱塞，嚥酸噎 氣吞酸，或酒積泄結痛，加黃連、白芍、陳皮各一兩，石膏、甘草各五 錢，砂仁、木香各二錢，川芎四錢 , “For pent-up [qi] blockage in the chest and diaphragm brought forth by phlegm fire, with acid swallowing, burping, and acid regurgitation, as well as for outflow accompanied by twisting pain resulting from an accumulation of wine, add 1 liang each of huang lian , bai shao , and chen pi , 5 qian each of shi gao and gan cao , 2 qian each of sha ren and mu xiang , as well as 4 qian of chuan xiong ”.
